sub_title: Microsoft Cloud Architect | Microsoft Intune Specialist | SCCM Specialist | Solution architect |  MCT | Incident management | Problem management | Release Management | End To End Packaging | Blockchain Developer |
summary:
I am an experienced IT professional with over 15 years of expertise in the IT service, software, and hardware industry. I hold a Master's degree (MSc) from the University of Barcelona and a Bachelor's degree in IT (ing) from the University of Amsterdam, specializing in infrastructure and Microsoft technologies.

In addition to my academic qualifications, I have acquired several certifications to enhance my skills and knowledge:

- Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT)
- Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
- Microsoft 365 Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator Associate
- Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate
- MCSE: Private Cloud 2012
- MCSE: Cloud Platform and Infrastructure — Certified 2016
- MCITP: Windows Server 2008, Enterprise
- MCSA: Windows Server 2012 R2
- MCSA: Windows Server 2008 R2
- MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Applications Infrastructure, Configuration
- MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, Configuration
- MCTS: Windows Server 2008 Network Infrastructure, Configuration
- Administering System Center 2012 Configuration Manager
- Deploying System Center 2012 Configuration Manager
- Windows 7, Configuring
- Microsoft Certified Professional (MCPS)
- Powershell: Automating Administration
- CCA: Citrix Certified Administrator for Citrix Xendesktop 5
- Cisco CCNA 1, CCNA 2, CCNA 3
- Aries software, Aries Hardware
- International Student Certificate
- Prince 2 (in progress)
- Agile/Scrum management (in progress)

My areas of expertise include virtualization and cloud computing, specifically in the following domains:

- Cloud platform and Infrastructure
- Private Cloud
- Citrix Xendesktop
- Citrix Xen-App
- Microsoft App-V
- VMware

Moreover, I am proficient in several programming languages such as Python, Java, C, C++, Solidity, and Powershell. With my extensive skill set and industry experience, I am equipped to contribute effectively to IT projects and deliver valuable solutions.

profile_positions.description:
Working as Freelancer from Saensolutions.
Experience with following departments and roles: 

Virtualization and Cloud Computing
-    Cloud platform and Infrastructure
-    Private Cloud
-    Citrix Xendesktop
-    Citrix Xen-App
-    Microsoft App-V
-    VMware

Infrastructure Engineer (System Engineer)
Incident management
-    Incident management manager
-    Incident management coordinator
-    Outsource specialist incident management to abroad
-    Creation of skilled or unskilled help desk and first line service
-    Technical documentation and training to 2nd line employees (IMKDS)
-    Technical support 3rd line

Release management
-    Software distribution (SCCM 2007 / 2012)
-    Migration of applications, for example, 32-bit to x64-bit source (SCCM, Citrix, App-V)
-    End To end packaging (Intakes and packaging)
-    Citrix Xen-App management and publishing (Citrix and SCCM)
-    Microsoft App-V managing and publishing (App-V and SCCM)
-    Citrix XenDesktop management and provisioning (XenDesktop studio, ESX, Vsphere, SCCM and AD)
-    MSI managing and deployment (SCCM)
-    Release management coordinator (Planning and management tools)

Problem Management
-    Creation of a problem with ticketing software (Maximo, ServiceNow and etc)
-    Finding workaround for the specific problem
-    Finding a structural solutions for the specific problem
-    Creation of RCA (Root case analyse)

Change Management
-    Creation of Changes with ticketing software 
-    Change approvals 
-    Change execution

Patch Management
-    Test and installation of monthly security and critical updates
-    Patches deployment to pilot  (SCCM, WSUS, SMS)
-    Patches deployment to Production (SCCM, WSUS, SMS)
profile_positions.title: Experience

profile_positions.description:
As Incident manager my responsibilities: 

•	Ensuring post-review of priority 1 incidents
•	Chairing the incident and problem review meetings
•	Following defined escalation path when needed, as defined in the escalation policy
•	Notifying the participants in the Incident Management process when standards and procedures 
         are not being followed
•	Rerouting misdirected incidents that have not been handled in a timely manner
•	Responding to the Incident Analysts regarding escalation issues in a timely and appropriate 
         fashion
•	Identifying incidents which need special attention or escalation
•	Managing major incidents
•	Carries out the process manager responsibilities for the Incident Management process
